# The `XCoreMCInstLower.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

This file contains code to lower <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/xcore">XCore</a> MachineInstrs to their corresponding <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a> records.
